snippet: Track and field takes center stage with Usain Bolt in action, Kara Goucher contends with the top Kenyan runners in the women's marathon and Andy Murray meets Roger Federer with gold on the line.
abstract: Track and field takes center stage with Usain Bolt in action, Kara Goucher contends with the top Kenyan runners in the women's marathon and Andy Murray meets Roger Federer with gold on the line.

headline.main: What We're Watching: Focus Shifts to the Track
